/*
Flick reference spectrum for downward plane irradiance just above
the ocean surface under a cloud-free sky and and with a US standard
atmosphere. See
flick/Example/accurt_calls/reference_spectrum/make_reference_spectrum.py
for further specifications of solar zenith angle, aerosols, spectral
width, etc.

Column 1: Wavelength [nm]
Column 2: Irradiance [W/m2/nm]
*/
